body_html:
Hi,
As I mentioned in my question, I use python 2.7 with tf 1.4.0 on Debian 8.7 with a K80 with 12GB of memory. I am using CUDA 8 and cuDNN 6. I installed it through pip and did not install bazel.
The whole code is more than 1000 lines and it is not on a public git yet.
If you could not check the error, I'll try to implement a small code to reproduce the error.
Please let me know.
Afshin

body:
Hi, 
As I mentioned in my question, I use python 2.7 with tf 1.4.0 on Debian 8.7 with a K80 with 12GB of memory. I am using CUDA 8 and cuDNN 6. I installed it through pip and did not install bazel. 
The whole code is more than 1000 lines and it is not on a public git yet. 
If you could not check the error, I'll try to implement a small code to reproduce the error. 
Please let me know. 
Afshin
